description: You're stranded in an abandoned polar research cabin as the temperature plummets and wind howls outside. You must find a way to signal for rescue and escape before it's too late.

rooms.description: Metal desks covered in frost. A generator hums weakly in the corner. The radio crackles with static.
Shelves hold frozen food cans and broken tools. A faint draft comes from the west.
Empty cots and scattered notebooks. One bed has fresh footprints beside it. A survival pack sits ready.
A cramped room with communications equipment. The emergency beacon blinks amber, waiting to be activated.
The main generator rumbles below. Fuel reserves are dangerously low. Emergency lights flicker overhead.
A heavy reinforced door leads outside into the blizzard. Warning lights flash above it. This is your way out, but only when rescue arrives.

generator.name: Emergency Generator
generator.description: A backup generator running on its last reserves of fuel. It needs refueling to maintain power.

use.successMessage: The generator continues to rumble. It needs fuel to keep running.
use.failureMessage: The generator is already running, but it needs more fuel.

radio.name: Communication Radio
radio.description: A weather-beaten radio that might still reach someone if the power holds.

use.successMessage: You turn the radio's dial. Static crackles and hisses, but no clear signal comes through. The power seems insufficient.
use.failureMessage: The radio needs adequate power to transmit.

coat.name: Insulated Coat
coat.description: A heavy winter coat that could save your life in the blizzard.

can.name: Frozen Food Can
can.description: A can of preserved food, frozen solid.

use.successMessage: You manage to open the frozen can and eat the preserved food. It's cold but edible, giving you some energy.
use.failureMessage: The can is frozen solid. You need something to open it with.

toolbox.name: Tool Box
toolbox.description: A metal box containing various repair tools.

use.successMessage: You open the toolbox and examine the contents: wrenches, screwdrivers, pliers, and other basic repair tools. They might come in handy.
use.failureMessage: You can't use the toolbox right now.

flare_gun.name: Flare Gun
flare_gun.description: A bright red flare gun with one flare loaded. Essential for signaling rescue.

use.successMessage: You fire the flare gun into the storm. The brilliant red flare arcs high into the sky, cutting through the blizzard like a beacon of hope.
use.failureMessage: You should wait until you're ready to signal the rescue helicopter.

notebook.name: Research Notebook
notebook.description: A notebook with logs from the previous research team. The final entry mentions emergency protocols.

thermos.name: Steel Thermos
thermos.description: An insulated thermos, still slightly warm.

use.successMessage: You unscrew the cap and drink the warm liquid inside. It's coffee, still faintly warm, and it helps fight the cold.

survival_pack.name: Survival Pack
survival_pack.description: A backpack containing emergency rations, first aid supplies, and thermal blankets.

emergency_beacon.name: Emergency Beacon
emergency_beacon.description: A distress beacon that can signal for rescue. It blinks amber, waiting to be activated.

use.failureMessage: The beacon needs power to function.

weather_radio.name: Weather Radio
weather_radio.description: A specialized radio for monitoring weather conditions and rescue communications.

use.successMessage: You turn on the weather radio. A robotic voice announces: 'Severe blizzard warning in effect. Wind speeds 60 mph. Visibility near zero. Seek shelter immediately.'
use.failureMessage: The weather radio needs power to function.

antenna.name: Radio Antenna
antenna.description: A large antenna array connected to the communications equipment.

fuel_can.name: Fuel Can
fuel_can.description: A heavy can of diesel fuel. Enough for several more hours of generator power.

use.failureMessage: You can't use the fuel can here.

backup_generator.name: Backup Generator
backup_generator.description: A secondary generator that's currently offline. Could provide emergency power if needed.

use.successMessage: You try to start the backup generator, but it won't turn over. It looks like it hasn't been maintained in years.
use.failureMessage: The backup generator is non-functional without repairs and fuel.

fuel_gauge.name: Fuel Gauge
fuel_gauge.description: Shows the fuel level is critically low and dropping.

exit_door.name: Emergency Exit Door
exit_door.description: A reinforced door leading outside. A red light indicates it's sealed until rescue protocols are completed.

use.successMessage: You push open the heavy emergency exit door. The blizzard's fury hits you immediately, but you're prepared.
use.failureMessage: The door is sealed. The red light indicates the emergency protocols haven't been completed yet.

warning_sign.name: Warning Sign
warning_sign.description: EMERGENCY EXIT - Do not open during blizzard conditions unless rescue is confirmed.

emergency_kit.name: Emergency Kit
emergency_kit.description: A wall-mounted emergency kit with medical supplies and emergency instructions.

use.successMessage: You open the emergency kit and find medical supplies, bandages, and an instruction card for emergency procedures. Everything is still sealed and ready for use.
use.failureMessage: You can't use the emergency kit right now.
